thread.title: Coming to JQH Arena: Jason Aldean
thread.title_full: Coming to JQH Arena: Jason Aldean

title: Coming to JQH Arena: Jason Aldean
text:
Coming to JQH Arena: Jason Aldean Gregory J. Holman , News-Leader 10:25 a.m. CDT October 19, 2015 Jason Aldean performs during the 48th annual CMA Awards. On January 23, he's headlining at JQH Arena in Springfield. Tickets go on sale Friday. (Photo: Robert Deutsch, USA Today) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Country music star Jason Aldean will play a show at JQH Arena on Jan. 23, the arena announced late Friday. 
The concert, part of the 24-city " We Were Here Tour 2016 ," includes appearances by country artists Thomas Rhett and A Thousand Horses . 
Tickets go on sale Friday at 10 a.m. from the JQH Arena box office, 417-836-7678, and at MissouriStateTix.com . 
Tickets are priced at $64.75 and $34.75, according to MissouriStateTix.com. 
Also on Friday, Aldean released a new music video, " Gonna Know We Were Here ." 
It features Aldean revisiting his high school alma mater, Windsor Academy in Macon, Georgia. 
“This song pretty much sums up how I feel like me and my fans live our lives,” Aldean said on JasonAldean.com . “That same excitement is what we feel out there on the road every night, which made it a great name for next year’s tour. It was pretty cool that we could bring that vibe to the music video too by shooting it back in Macon with a ton of people from my hometown. Getting back there and on that high school football field really reminded me of that rush of just living life without any regrets.”  //sgfnow.co/1RRRf4D MORE STORIES
